hint: Apply safe, proven optimizations by pushing filters into joins early, isolating dimension table filters first, and using CTEs for clarity without aggressive restructuring.
Isolate both date dimension filters (d1, d2) into separate CTEs with predicate pushdown, then restructure dimension joins to reduce intermediate result sizes.
Restructure with multiple prefetch CTEs that pre-filter and pre-join dimensions with facts before the final aggregation, optimizing for DuckDB's join ordering.
Experiment with radical restructuring: combine all conditional sums into a single-pass aggregation, transform CASE logic to UNION branches, and explore decorrelation patterns.
